wiki.content: "Dream On" is the first single by Aerosmith from their 1973 debut album, Aerosmith. Written by lead singer Steven Tyler, this blues-influenced power ballad became their first major hit. Although it peaked at #59 when it was originally released as a single in 1973, it became a Top 10 single in 1976, peaking at #6, when it was re-released as a single. This song was first played live in Willimantic, CT at the Shaboo Inn. Song was re-done by Aerosmith in 2007 for the game "Guitar Hero: Aerosmith". According to the Dream On Songfacts, Tyler said :"It's about the hunger to be somebody: Dream until your dreams come true." Eminem sampled the song for his 2003 hit single Sing for the Moment. In it, Joe Perry of Aerosmith plays the guitar solo at the end of the song, and Steven Tyler sings the song’s chorus. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Dream On" is the first single by Aerosmith from their 1973 debut album, Aerosmith. Written by lead singer Steven Tyler, this blues-influenced power ballad became their first major hit. Although it peaked at #59 when it was originally released as a single in 1973, it became a Top 10 single in 1976, peaking at #6, when it was re-released as a single. This song was first played live in Willimantic, CT at the Shaboo Inn.

track.name: Dream On
comments:
You know it´s true.....
all the things come back to you

Sing whith me,
sing for the year,
sing for the laughter,
sing for the tear,

Sing whith me if it´s just for today
maybe tomorrow the good lord will take you away!
OMG I haven't heard this song in so long! Love it!
80s ballads? This song is from 1973. lol
Oh my God, I love '80s ballads!
one of their first hits, but it has stood the test of time and still is a signature tune for the boys!
I really like this song, and I'm not even an Aerosmith fan
